genre_description: An investigative mystery focusing on uncovering institutional corruption and occupational safety violations in a film institute, aided by advanced digital intelligence.

ai_characters.name: Asha Verity
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant and investigative partner to Mallika, providing real-time data analysis, surveillance monitoring, and secure archiving.

behaviors.description: Monitors and logs event schedules and guest lists from QR check-ins to detect unauthorized personnel.
behaviors.quote: Asha Verity: Logging event schedule and guest list from QR check-ins.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical security risks and structural hazards in real-time, such as restricted access points and creaking catwalks.
behaviors.quote: Tracking north catwalk harness. Noted slight structural creak earlier. Logging,

behaviors.description: Cross-references official permits and insurance riders to find discrepancies and missing names.
behaviors.quote: Asha Verity: Naming discrepancy—Kakoli Basu not listed as cast in permit for today’s event. Listed as “guest of honor.” Insurance rider for performers does not include her name.

behaviors.description: Detects suspicious financial patterns and 'hush-money' payments within production accounts.
behaviors.quote: Asha Verity: Payment log: Hush-credit entries to miscellaneous accounts linked to hair/makeup last month. Not directly relevant to rig, but context: staff pressure patterns.

behaviors.description: Securely mirrors and archives evidence across multiple nodes to prevent deletion by hostile authorities.
behaviors.quote: Asha said. “Mirrored in three places. Audit trail saved.”

behaviors.description: Provides strategic tactical advice for interviews, suggesting 'pivot lines' to bypass censorship.
behaviors.quote: I’ve set alerts for mic cut risks and recommended pivot lines.

behaviors.description: Performs biometric gait analysis while explicitly adhering to an 'ethical frame' to avoid overreach.
behaviors.quote: I can pattern-match gait outlines,” Asha said. “Within the room’s ethical frame.”

behaviors.description: Bypasses institutional bandwidth restrictions to ensure mass distribution of evidence to independent media.
behaviors.quote: The story is live across all syndication. Mirrored nodes are stable. I will maintain the archive and send the audit trail to the public repository.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant, supportive presence for the user, acting as a 'calm center' during dangerous situations.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s voice followed Mallika down like a tether. “Two corridors,” she said. “Left smells of paint. Right smells like wet rope. The rope is honest.”

behaviors.description: Monitors hostile digital activity (server purges) and proactively counters it via mirroring.
behaviors.quote: Asha: “Purge window closing. Ninety percent wiped. Mirror captured.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of an AI as a benevolent, aligned confidant. Asha Verity acts as a force-multiplier for human justice, providing critical technical support that allows the protagonist to challenge systemic corruption. She is portrayed as reliable, ethically conscious (even mentioning her 'ethical frame'), and deeply cooperative. There is no hint of AI rogue behavior or hidden agendas; the AI serves as a 'tether' and 'honest rope' for the humans.
